Name: Amethyst Paragon
Description:
Gain 1 Aether.
Any ally may prep a spell in hand to their opened or closed breach(es).

Name: Amethyst Shard
Description:
Gain 1 Aether.
Any ally may draw a card and then discard a card in hand.

Name: Cinder
Description:
Cast: Deal 1 damage.
OR
Cast: Gain 2 Aether.

Name: Coal Shard
Description:
If you have 2 life or less, destroy this.
Otherwise, gain 3 Aether, gain 1 charge, and suffer 2 damage.

Name: Emerald Shard
Description:
Gain 1 Aether
OR
Any player gains 1 life.

Name: Eternal Ember
Description:
Cast: Deal 1 damage.
OR
Cast: Cast one of your prepped spells without discarding it.

Name: Extinguish
Description:
Cast: Deal 1 damage.
If this damage causes a minion from the nemesis deck to be discarded, Quilius gains a Trophy token.

Name: Flare
Description: Cast: Reveal the top card of the turn order deck, and then place it back on top of the turn order deck. If you revealed a player turn order card, deal 3 damage. Otherwise deal 1 damage.

Name: Garnet Shard
Description:
Gain 1 Aether.
OR
Cast any player's prepped spell.

Name: Illuminate
Description:
While prepped, when you focus or open one of your breaches during your turn, deal 1 damage.
Cast: Deal 1 damage.

Name: Moonstone Shard
Description:
Gain 1 Aether.
Gain an additional 1 Aether that can only be used to gain a gem.

Name: Oblivion Shard
Description: Gain 2 Aether that cannot be used to gain a relic or spell.

Name: Obsidian Shard
Description:
Gain 1 Aether.
You may suffer 1 damage. If you do, gain an additional 2 Aether.

Name: Quartz Shard
Description:
Gain 1 Aether.
Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. You may place that card on the bottom or the top of the turn order deck. If you revealed a player turn order card, gain an additional 1 Aether.

Name: Shattered Geode
Description:
Gain 1 Aether.
You may place the top card of any ally's discard pile into your hand.

Name: Torch
Description:
Cast: Deal 1 damage.
OR
Cast: Focus any player's breach.

Name: Tourmaline Shard
Description:
Gain 1 Aether.
Any ally may suffer 1 damage. If they do, they destroy a card in hand.

Name: Worldheart Shard
Description:
Gain 1 Aether.
OR
Gain 2 Aether that can only be used to gain a card. Place the next card you gain this turn on top of any ally's discard pile.
